articles.description: Manly’s Tom Trbojevic denies vision of him running through The Corso in Manly on Saturday night was responsible for the hamstring injury that has rubbed him out for six weeks.
articles.content:
The Sea Eagles star fronted the media after it was revealed he had suffered a grade two tear from what the club described as an innocuous accident.
